Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Resurrection and the Holy Fifty Days (Ps 67:1):

Text.Language: Mareftwnf n~je V] maroujwr e~bol n~je nefjaji t/rou: marouvwt e~bol qa t~h/ m~pefho n~je ouon niben eymoc] m~pefran eyu.
Let God arise, Let all His enemies be scattered; Let those also who hate His holy name flee before His face..
ليـقــم الله ولـتـتبـدٌد جميــع أعـدائـه وليهـرب من امام وجـهه كل مبغضى اسمــه القــدوس.
